name: formant
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a characteristic part of the quality of a speech sound, especially a vowel: Various voice features are used in the identification of criminals, but vowel formants are particularly important.formant frequency Differences between male and female voices include vowel length and formant frequencies.
More examplesFewer examplesSpectrographic analysis was used to identify the frequencies of the formants.These children may have difficulty processing formant transitions in consonant sounds.The formant values on the graph follow a normal distribution.
